## colorwheel() function

Returns the colorwheel RGB value as an integer/hex value for the given number

Based on C implementation from [https://github.com/adafruit/circuitpython/blob/main/shared-module/rainbowio/\_\_init\_\_.c](https://github.com/adafruit/circuitpython/blob/main/shared-module/rainbowio/__init__.c)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function colorwheel(pos: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pos | number | a number between 0 and 255 |

**Returns:**

number
